::Lord Jhiaxus::
   
  Jhiaxus takes a moment to tie up and gag the clone of Nightlight.
   
  Jhiaxus: There we go. Nice and believable.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
          > Hydras:
> 
> Hydraslooked seriously to others bots and said "I dont need to 
> remember you that this clone" he hit the clone"is a fraud and the 
> true one is held in a secret cell... IF someone told something about 
> Ill personally will kill him"
>
> ::Lord Jhiaxus::
> 
> Jhiaxus: My lips are sealed. He looks to everyone else.
> Jhiauxs: Yours better be too!
> 

Myrmidon nodded, not in the slightest bit put off by this showy display
of agression and threats. In fact rather than fear, the smallest hint
of a smile flits across his face as they show some of the true
agression that run in most Predacons. 

"Good! Now your showing some spark!" Myrmidon chuckled, "I have no
intention of revealing any of this ruse." Myrmidon looked around at the
others, "I only meant that our prey will probrably not come alone. So
if he is of no sport, perhaps his companions would be."

> Hydras:
> "Then let�s go"Hydras "We have alot things to do and to be sure that 
> this... Rodimus doesnt suspect that this is a drone" Hydras hit again
> the clone "we must.. gag it"

Myrmidon nodded once again. "I would suggest monitoring our captive's
radio, stealing the encryption codes from it is simple enough. No doubt
Rodimus is already trying to communicate with her. if not now, then
soon." Myrmidon smiled toothilly, "Plus listening to their
communications may give us some insight to their plans."

OOC: I MIGHT get in another post or two before I leave for the weekend.
If you don't hear anything .. see you Sunday or Monday!

Preston
(Myrmidon)
